nodes.text: Revwien lettuce was a type of lettuce used in the Besalisk Dexter Jettster's restaurant, Dex's Diner, which was located on the planet of Coruscant. The lettuce was used as an ingredient in a number of dishes before his diner was destroyed in around 18 BBY. Such meals included Jettster's Coruscant slider, a slider inspired by his time on the galactic capital; his Shawda Club and Besh-Leth-Trill sandwiches; and the Interstellar garden salad. The lettuce used in the last was grown in VegSatellites orbiting Coruscant.

Revwien lettuce is mentioned in a Hyperspace-exclusive release, "Dining at Dex's," written by Gregory Walker, which represents the in-universe menu of Dex's Diner. The Revwiens are a plant-like species found in the Star Wars galaxy, one of which first appeared in Droids 6. Nothing beyond a nominal connection between the food and the species has been established.
